text:
[Verse]
Woke up in a rainbow haze
Colors dancing soft and bright
Dreams are painting in my mind
Lost in this kaleidoscope night

[Verse 2]
Sky of pink and ocean blue
Purple mountains high and true
Every shade a tale to tell
Chasing stars that never fell

[Chorus]
Dreaming in colors
Life's a living art
Every hue a memory
Painting from the heart

[Verse 3]
Clouds are glowing golden red
Sunsets spread across my bed
Whispers of a moonlit flood
Brushing strokes of liquid love

[Verse 4]
Every step's a different hue
Pastel paths that lead me through
Worlds of wonder
Skies so wide
Wrapped in this chromatic ride

[Chorus]
Dreaming in colors
Life's a living art
Every hue a memory
Painting from the heart
title: Dreaming in Colors
